website_summaries.verdict: An easy and inexpensive way to turn your full-size truck bed into a comfortable, off-the-ground campsite.
pros: Comes with a case for convenient storage
Includes built-in floor to keep dirt from truck bed off your gear
cons: No back window to allow you to access cab while in the tent

customer_reviews.title: Great Truck Tent!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an affordable truck tent to travel to visit my family. This worked perfectly. The fabric is plenty tough enough and it fit very well even though I didn't remove my Tonneau cover. Easy to assemble and break-down but I did need assistance getting the rods into the pockets - two pair of hands helps a lot! I put in a twin size air mattress and a 3 inch foam topper and slept like a baby. It did not rain on my trip so I can't speak about performance in the bad weather, but the construction makes me believe that it would handle this well. I really like being up off the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: My new Deer Camp Tent
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think this tent would work on my 8 ft truck bed because of the tool box...WRONG...my idea worked and I was able to put the tent up as it was made for a standard 6.5 truck bed. Amazing truck bed tent that is easy to put together, sturdy in inclement weather (camped in it on Oct 27-29, 2019) and with a Mr.Heater Lil Buddy it stayed 72 degrees in the tent the whole time. This tent is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Agcopra

customer_reviews.title: Great price and spacious
customer_reviews.text: The tent was great I put it on my 2017 f150 6.5 in bed only problem I had was one of the tent sticks broke but it still held up may have been a user error I would recommend keeping windows open if you have the rain fly on tent doesn’t breath too well with it on also if anyone knows where I can get a replacement tent stick lmk! But I would def buy this again Update: contacted manufacturer and they are sending me a replacement tent stick!! Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent if you don't like being on the Ground!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for our 2005 GMC 4x4 with a standard short bed, (6'5") the tent fits pretty nice. The only thing is the tailgate end of the tent is wider than the tailgate and the tie down straps hang over the ends of the tailgate, so the tent door fit is a little loose. Other than that it fits real nice. The rain fly fits like a glove and should work real well. We haven't used it yet, other than just putting it in the truck at home. We plan on using it for Deer hunting. I gave it a 5 star rating for the price and ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Gutbucket Tom

customer_reviews.title: It is okay...
customer_reviews.text: Tent was okay. But the straps will break easily. With very little pull one of the straps tore! I have a RAM 1500, and the tent appeared to be too small. It would not quite make it to the end of the gate. Maybe I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Beerhappy

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fit
customer_reviews.text: Product material is nice, ripstop is always good. Biggest issue is that the fitment was really bad. Was tight against the back of the bed so the tents lining isn’t flush against the floor, so if i wanted to put an air mattress in there (which i intend to) there’s no way it would work. I drive an 04 tundra double cab, so i cant speak to fit with other trucks. Some others have better luck, seems like it works well with fords. Material is nice though, just wont work for what i needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent was so affordable and I was worried about the quality at the low price. I am pleasantly surprised! It was easy to put up in the truck bed (Nissan Titan) and looks great. Our full size air mattress fits well too. Thanks for the great deal! Camping rocks even more now!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Solid truck tent.
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with assembly instructions, but if you've ever set up a regular tent, you wouldn't need them anyway. It's really a common sense design. Also, mine looked really good, better than the pictures on here surprisingly. One note, it does have built in flooring, so if you have a tools box, you'll have to put it in front of that; I don't believe the tent would function if you just cut out the bottom either. You could get creative though if you needed too with some 550 cord, or something, if you really wanted the flooring gone to put the tent over the tool box haha
customer_reviews.author: thatguy09

customer_reviews.title: Easy and affordable truck tent
customer_reviews.text: Went camping and my wife really enjoyed it. We could have stayed in a camper with family, but we both really enjoyed our new truck tent experience. My 2 daughters set it up in driveway in 30 minutes. We set it up in 20 minutes at campsite. Yes, it fit our 2015 short bed perfect. Spend the money on a top quality air mattress. Ours was old and made for lots of tossing and turning. Also, my daughters wrapped the anchor straps which are metal in duct tape. I would recommend that so you do not have it clanking or chipping any paint as you set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fit like we wanted it to, but over all is a good truck tent.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good truck tent. We only used it once. 1st set up was hard, but after you figure it out it will be easier the next time. It didn't fit the way we wanted it to, but it works. We were for the most part dry, even though it rained really hard both nights. The tent didn't leak, but there was a lot of condensation. We own a dodge ram with full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Momma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Great quality and ease of use. The directions were perfect. We used this truck tent on a remote island with temps in the low 20s with moderate snow fall. It did great with a Mr. Heater the tent was comfortable with plenty of head room and room to spread out. The optional rain cover that comes with the tent is great and easy to put on as well. Plenty of perfectly placed tie downs on the tent and rain cover. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for me and my wife we're both about 6 feet tall , it stays generally cool inside during the day compared to other tents I've used but unfortunately it was windy while i was setting it up and one of the holders for the sticks ripped out 3/4 of the way
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zertuche

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy set up. Did however have two broken hook straps but hopefully I can get some replacement straps. This did not affect the setup. I highly recommend this tent I have a 2013 Dodge Ram quad cab and this thing fit almost perfect. Well perfect enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. You can visually see thing places in the fabric as well as along the seams. Condensation can go through easily. If it rains you’ll be soaked no matter what. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Menika S. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Seams on my tent started to pull open around door opening
customer_reviews.text: During first use, seams around door opening started to open up. I returned, not sure if seams would have continued to open up. Return was simple and easy
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCann

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and when we opened it to use it, it had a hole in it. I will be returning this! It would have worked if not for the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. I extremely like how the tent covers the whole truck and keeps out any chance of rain getting into the truck bed. I am 5ft10in and i can stand up fully inside the tent. Highly recommend this tent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richards

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get a chance to use this set up and the tie-down straps ripped right of the bat
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to setup, Sagged a bit due to my bed size but not the tents fault. I have a f150 xlt. Lots of moisure buildup in the morning due to sagging edges. Great quality, will use for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: David Raine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research and selected this tent. I am super happy with it! Not the most expensive truck bed tent on the market but definitely the right one for me. Easy to assemble and looks sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value !!!!  Fits in truck very Nicely !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Value !!! Fits in truck very well !!! More head room and room period than expected . Loving it . Highly recommended !!!! Utilized the 1st time this past weekend received plenty compliment on tent ,
customer_reviews.author: Zosoredbone

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Wish the bag it comes with was a bit bigger but it’s fantastic. Decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Affordable first tent
customer_reviews.text: A good first tent for starters. The quality is not good enough for it to last long though
customer_reviews.author: I PAY BILLS

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: literally came apart during initial setup. returned, and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HB-Local

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy poles. I set up once and the poles are already starting to crack. The tent itself doesn't fit flat with the straps being snug. I have a full size 2019 f-150. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put last pole into slots
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not in package. Figured it out myself. It is not efficient to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my tundra easy set up and plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: jerome Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was my husbands Christmas present. He loved it and we used it straight away. It was so fun and romantic on the beach and nice to be up off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Megan Denny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to assemble. It comes in a nice zippered bag and looks nice. However, it came torn and it was made out of cheap material. Zíper is hard to work also.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Good Tent
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure because l read some bad reviews I found out this was very easy to put up and the instructions were great. I have not put on my truck yet, but I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Steve Draper

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it, but came defective.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the tent, but at unpacking one pole was broken and the tent has a hole. We can’t use it, I contacted the seller, but no response, so might just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little short
customer_reviews.text: Does not extend to the tailgate of an F250. Overall worked great, just wish it was a little longer to fit as it was designed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly how y'all described it thanks anyways
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tent but not exactly how they described it missing the extra flap in the back for the extra air flow they say it has
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits full size truck very well especially for the price .. awsome tent for under $100 ..
customer_reviews.author: kevin t.

customer_reviews.title: i would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: was great in cooler weather, it keep us warmer because we didn't sleep on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely, easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: We used the tent during deer hunting. So much better than being on the cold, wet ground! Fit in the truck just right. Easily put up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the tent
customer_reviews.text: Came on time camped in it last night awesome lots of room also
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we need it for. Can't beat the Price. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: STEFYLEIGH

customer_reviews.title: Great truck tent!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was for a Christmas present for my son in law. He was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Randall

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but well made
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to assemble by my self but it was sturdy once it was up
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: tent i got was not the same as shown no venting
customer_reviews.text: truck tent does not have venting as shown , was missing one hold down strap
customer_reviews.author: jim peterson

product_meta.title: Milliard Truck Tent | Standard 6.5ft Bed
feature_bullets: EASY- Setup is simple and quick with our clear instruction manual, and the carry case makes travel easy.
COMFORTABLE- The sewn in floor means dirt from your truck bed won’t get into the tent and a rainfly is included for use in wet conditions.
PRIVATE – The mesh door and windows feature privacy shades so you can sleep in peace.
UPGRADED – The superior ripstop grade material is super durable and long-lasting, plus the tent features a lantern hook and inside storage pocket to enhance your night out.
SIZE – This tent is designed to fit a standard 6.5ft truck bed. Measure your bed with the tailgate closed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
